const LeaveApp = (props) => { const [userApprove, setUserApprove] = useState(true); const [userBreks, setUserBreks] = useState(true); const changNameUser = () => { setUserBreks(!userBreks); }; const changApprove = () => { setUserApprove(!userApprove);
